title: Probabely bug with bachnorm2d - different behavior between two same networks in evaluation and training mode
body_html:
• OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: pytorch-cpu 0.3.0 py36_cpuh7097a09_4
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Python version: Python 3.6.3 |Anaconda custom (64-bit)| (default, Oct 13 2017, 12:02:49)
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: None
  • GPU models and configuration: None
  • GCC version (if compiling from source):

I have explained my problem completely here. I don't know how to figure it out. Could you please help me?
